description: Guldah's most devout followers can invoke her blessing in the form of defense. Boosts target's defense stat.
The first healing chant you learn as a priest.
The first iteration of controlling light to protect oneself.
One then the other just like they teach in the thieve's guild.
A basic attack learned as a child.
A mighty 180 degree swing striking all targets in it's Arc.
Warriors train their bodies to withstand blows more effectively.  +5% HP
All magicians must first learn to give raw mana form, and control it. This ability proves to their master they are ready to channel it into an element.
There is something to be said about the ability to manifest pressurized water. So many applications…
No kindling required, imagine if the cavemen would have learned to make fire this way.
Using mana to amplify the innate magnetism in stones is the first step to building your own golem friends.
Not just simple cantrips, no… The Wind mages controlled the very gales. It starts bending a gust to one's whims.
After using a Section 0 ability, gain +10% attack speed for 3s.
While wielding a sword or axe in your mainhand, gain +5 Attack.
